name: Loky by Virtuals
description: Loky is a unified agentic data infrastructure layer for decentralized systems, enabling developers, protocols, and communities to build and deploy autonomous agents powered by real-time on-chain data, analytics, and programmable endpoints. From smart wallets and trading bots to dashboards and institutional-grade intelligence tools, Loky serves as the data backbone of the decentralized ecosystem, delivering structured, actionable insights at machine speed.
